item.title: Heavy Cmd
item.dc:creator: @Arrav Arrav
item.description:
@Arrav wrote:

I call this Heavy Cmd because it is harder to use atm than the real windows cmd…

Why I am making this project:

So people can use this in-case of a file blocker at a school computer blocks the cmd.exe,
So I’m making this project so people can use something like cmd.exe, without it being blocked… Hopefully i will learn a bit of C# out of this…

Atm this project is very small and will be looking forward to update it, this project will be using C# and the source will be open to the public…

Video (s):

Source (1 class):

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Diagnostics;

namespace CmdHeavy
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int turn = 0;
            if (turn == 0)
            {
                turn = 1;
                Console.WriteLine("Type(Executable, printIpInfo): ");
                Console.WriteLine();
                string Type = Console.ReadLine();
                if (Type == "Executable")
                {
                    Console.WriteLine("Enter Info: (Example: pathToExecutable args1 args2 args3) ");
                    string execute = Console.ReadLine();
                    string[] executedArgs = execute.Split(' ');
                    Process pro = new Process();
                    pro.StartInfo.FileName = @execute;
                    pro.StartInfo.Arguments = executedArgs[0];
                    pro.Start();
                }
                else if (Type == "printIpInfo")
                {

                }
                turn = 0;
            }
        }
    }
}

Java(Does’nt work yet.):

/*
 * To change this template, choose Tools | Templates
 * and open the template in the editor.
 */
package cmdheavy;

/**
 *
 * @author Admin Jonah
 */
public class Program {

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
    public static void main(String[] args) throws java.io.IOException {
        // TODO code application logic here
        System.out.println();
        String Type = System.console().readLine("Type(Executable, printIpInfo): ");
        if (Type == "Executable")
        {
            Runtime run = Runtime.getRuntime(); 
            System.out.println();
            String execute = System.console().readLine("Enter Info (Example: pathToExecutable args1 args2 args3): ");
            String[] executedArgs = execute.split(" ");
            Process pro = run.exec(execute, executedArgs);
            synchronized (pro) {
                pro.notifyAll();
            }
        }
        else if (Type == "printIpInfo")
        {
            
        }
    }
}
